official-title.#text: To require notification of individuals of breaches of personally identifiable information through Exchanges under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives January 10, 2014.

short-title.#text: Health Exchange Security and Transparency Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1311

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: 1321 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1321

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: ) which is known to have resulted in personally identifiable information of an individual being stolen or unlawfully accessed, the
shall provide notice of such breach to each such individual.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Secretary of Health and Human Services

text.#text: Not later than two business days after the discovery of a breach of security of any system maintained by an Exchange established under

header.#text: Notification of individuals of breaches of personally identifiable information through PPACA Exchanges
